column1: 产品结构：首页->传感器->ds_da217明皜G-sensor

column4: Supply voltage, 1.62V to 3.6V；For 2x2x0.9 mm LGA-12 package；User selectable range, ±2g, ±4g, ±8g, ±16g；User selectable data output rate；Digital I2C/SPI output interface；14 bit resolution；Ultra-low power consumption；Embedded 32-level FIFO；Internal step counter；2 Programmable interrupt generators with independent function for motion detection；Factory programmable offset and sensitivity；RoHS compliant；芯片超小尺寸 Ultra small size；超低功耗 Ultra-Low power consumption；硬件计步 Internal step counter；FIFO 设置 32-Level Embeded 32 Level FIFO；软件算法 Software Design；芯片内置，便于结构设计 Built in chip for easy
